name: Push (itch) (jael137)
description:
Move with Arrow keys/WASD. One character can only move up and down, the onther from left to right. Let the characters help each other to both reach the finish. Reset the level with R.

Made in a short time by Jael137 for the Unidos Game jam.

The theme of this jam was: Supporting Others. I incorporated this in the game by needing all characters to push each other in order to reach the finish.

V1.1 - added a few new levels with a new mechanic: Doors and buttons
